# Zensical Migration Ownership Matrix Template

Use this matrix to make role ownership explicit across migration phases.

## Ownership matrix

| Workstream | Responsible | Accountable | Consulted | Informed |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| Prototype setup |  |  |  |  |
| Validation and checks |  |  |  |  |
| Cutover execution |  |  |  |  |
| Incident escalation |  |  |  |  |
| Rollback decision |  |  |  |  |
| Post-cutover verification |  |  |  |  |
| Postmortem and lessons |  |  |  |  |

## Notes

- Keep one clear accountable owner per workstream.
- Update this matrix whenever roles change.
- Link this matrix in checkpoint and cutover reports.
